response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which we believe would greatly benefit your business. Our product is valued at $1,000,000 by you, and we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive rate.
